thag2.36:1.1: Whose mind is like a rock,
thag2.36:1.3: free of desire for desirable things,
thag2.36:1.4: not getting annoyed when things are annoying?
thag2.36:1.5: From where will suffering strike one
thag2.36:1.6: whose mind is developed like this?
thag2.36:2.1: My mind is like a rock,
thag2.36:2.3: free of desire for desirable things,
thag2.36:2.4: not getting annoyed when things are annoying.
thag2.36:2.5: From where will suffering strike me
thag2.36:2.6: whose mind is developed like this?
